    • Method Detail

      • isChecked

        boolean isChecked(IChessboard board,
                  Piece king)
        Method to see is the king is checked
        Parameters:
        board - instance of the chessboard that contains the king
        king - instance of the king to check
        Returns:
        bool true if king is not safe, else returns false

      • isCheckmatedOrStalemated

        IKing.KingState isCheckmatedOrStalemated(IChessboard board,
                                         Piece king)
        Method to check is the king is checked or stalemated
        Parameters:
        board - instance of the chessboard that contains the king
        king - instance of the king piece to check
        Returns:
        safe, checkmate or stalemate

      • isSafe

        boolean isSafe(IChessboard board,
               Piece king,
               Square sq)
        Method to check is the king is checked by an opponent
        Parameters:
        board - instance of the chessboard that contains the king
        king - instance of the king piece to check
        sq - Square where is a king
        Returns:
        bool true if king is save, else returns false

      • willBeSafeAfterMove

        boolean willBeSafeAfterMove(IChessboard board,
                            Square sqIsHere,
                            Square sqWillBeThere)
        Method to check will the king be safe after the move of the pieces in the given squares
        Parameters:
        board - instance of the chessboard that contains the king
        sqIsHere - the original square of the piece
        sqWillBeThere - the future square of the piece
        Returns:
        boolean true if king is save, else returns false
